Test Name: Vedolizumab Quantitation with Reflex to Anti-Vedolizumab Antibodies, Serum
Purpose: To quantify vedolizumab levels in serum and, when levels are below detection, to detect anti-vedolizumab antibodies for patient management.
Container: Red-top tube (preferred) or serum separator tube (gold-top)
Equipment: ELISA or equivalent immunoassay platform, plate reader, incubator, refrigerated centrifuge
